mapper.select: SELECT P.PCODE, P.PNAME, P.PEXPIRATIONDATE, P.PPRICEDC, 100-P.PPRICEDC/P.PPRICE*100, SUM(B.BREVIEWSCORE)/COUNT(B.BREVIEWSCORE), COUNT(B.BREVIEWWRITEDATE), P.PFILEPATH FROM PRODUCT AS P, BNS AS B WHERE P.PCODE=B.PRODUCT_PCODE AND P.PCATEGORY=#{param1} AND P.PDELETEDATE IS NULL AND B.BREVIEWDELETEDATE IS NULL GROUP BY P.PCODE
